There were no other sightings in Rockledge on or around May 6th 2013
Summary: was looking over the water and saw three orange red lights in the shape of a triangle. after about 30 seconds of watching it each light went out one after the other.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was heading home from work and was coming up to a bridge going over a river. when i looked to the south west i saw three reddish orange lights just above the tree line in the shape of a triangle. i stopped to get a better look and as i was pulling my phone out to get video each light went out one after the other. stayed there for 20 minutes after hopping to see it again but it never appeared again.
